entry.data:
SNOW
SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 1 TO 3 INCHES
COLD WITH HIGHS AROUND 14
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 2 BELOW

SNOW
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 3 TO 5 INCHES
COLD
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 13
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

SNOW, MAINLY IN THE MORNING
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE MORNING
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 8 TO 12 INCHES
HIGHS AROUND 16
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 2 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 BELOW
NORTHWEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH IN THE EVENING
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 16
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 11 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND ZERO
HIGHS AROUND 30

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 5 TO 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
LOWS AROUND ZERO
